title: Site Reliability Engineer

company.name: Orange Digital Center
company.description: Orange's digital innovation center for Africa and Middle East

description: As a Site Reliability Engineer, you will be instrumental in automating our infrastructure and improving our deployment processes. We need someone who can build reliable CI/CD pipelines and ensure our systems are scalable and secure.
responsibilities: Monitor system performance and implement alerting
Implement security best practices and compliance
Optimize deployment processes and reduce downtime
Automate infrastructure provisioning using IaC tools
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Passion for technology and continuous learning
Proven track record of delivering projects
